mapper.select: select A.userid, A.contentsId,A.wanna, A.title, A.image1,A.catId ,to_char(to_date(to_char(eventstartdate,'99999999'),'yyyy.mm.dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_char(to_date(to_char(cD.eventEndDate,'99999999'),'yyyy.mm.dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'), cD.spendTime from(select pL.userid, pL.contentsId,pL.wanna,C.title,C.image1,C.catId from pickList pL, contents C where pL.contentsId=C.contentsId and pL.userid = #{userid}) A, contentsDetail cD
